ygData.subject: Amperion vs Savior
ygData.msgSnippet: Savior smiled. We not wish to fight. We know why you act this way. But we wish you to put down the weapons. we are here peacefully. we dont see your actions

 Savior smiled. "We not wish to fight. We know why you act this way. But we 
wish you to put down the weapons. we are here peacefully. we dont see your 
actions very wise or thought out please. we are here to help."
